## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a3872fd06d90c62536958c0cfab364a640608c0be6667166ca108d284cc88719)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'messaging-components' @ 1.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
